resources.string: This is only an approximate calculation, do not seriously count on it
Are you staying at home without going outside for no reason?
Do you keep safe distance from people on street?
Are you cover your mouth and nose on street?
Do you wash your hands and face when you return home?
Do you ventilate your house and do wet cleaning?
\nWithout going out, you protect yourself and others from the disease.\n
\nIn order not to pick up the virus from other people, keep a safe distance 1–1.5 meters.\n
\nWhen you cover nose and mouth, the chance of the virus getting into your body or passing it to someone else decreases.\n
\nAfter being outside, bacteria may remain on your body, be sure to wash your face and hands.\n
\nAfter airing and cleaning, you will surely save your room from harmful bacteria.\n
\nYou are doing everything right! Be healthy!\n
You need to reduce the number of contacts, stay home
Keep track of your temperature, it is the main symptom of the disease
Your well-being is like symptoms of an illness
Look for ways to deal with them
Your temperature is above normal, we recommend you see a doctor
You are rather at safe zone
You may be at risk zone
